name: extended-us-economic-indicators
title: Extended U.S. Economic Indicators: GDP and Unemployment Data (1920–Present)
description: This data package contains extended datasets for U.S. Gross Domestic Product (GDP) and Unemployment Rates, combining official modern data with historical annual data compiled from archival sources. The datasets provide a continuous time series starting from 1920.

sources.title: U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis (BEA) via FRED
U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) via FRED
U.S. Census Bureau’s Bicentennial Edition: Historical Statistics of the United States, Colonial Times to 1970

resources.name: gdp_combined_1920_2023_annual
resources.title: Combined Extended GDP Data (1920–2023 Annual)
resources.description: Extended real GDP dataset combining historical annual data (1920–1946) from U.S. Census Bureau with modern annual aggregates (1947–2023) from BEA via FRED.

fields.name: GDP
fields.description: Real GDP in billions of chained dollars.

resources.name: gdp_since_1920_1947_annual_us_census_bureau
resources.title: Historical GDP Data (1920–1947 Annual from Census Bureau)
resources.description: Annual real GDP data for 1920–1947 manually compiled from U.S. Census Bureau’s historical statistics.

fields.name: GDP
fields.description: Real GDP in billions of chained dollars.

resources.name: unrate_1920_1948
resources.title: Extended Unemployment Rate Data (1920–Present)
resources.description: Extended unemployment rate dataset with annual data (1920–1947) from U.S. Census Bureau and monthly data (1948–present) from BLS via FRED.

fields.name: Date
fields.description: Date in YYYY format for annual data or YYYY-MM for monthly data.

resources.name: unrate_since_1948_mly_bls
resources.title: Monthly Unemployment Rate Data (1948–Present from BLS)
resources.description: Monthly unemployment rate data from January 1948 to the present, sourced from BLS via FRED.
